purpose: To facilitate the development of complex, stateful applications that leverage large language models (LLMs) in Java environments.
principle: Builds on Java frameworks such as Spring AI and Langchain4j to provide a structured approach for integrating LLMs into multi-actor systems.
reusability: Designed for integration with existing Java applications, can be extended or customized through its API, and works seamlessly with Langchain4j.
limitations: Primarily focused on Java environments and may require additional setup for non-Java integrations. Limited documentation on specific use cases.
name: langgraph4j
description: ðŸš€ LangGraph for Java. A library for building stateful, multi-actor applications with LLMs, built for work jointly with Langchain4j and Spring AI
highlight: Enables the creation of stateful, multi-actor applications using LLMs in Java, integrated with Langchain4j and Spring AI.
